My works

Experience

I'm a frontend development student at Seattle Central College, specializing in web development and mobile development. Have done several projects involving HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and Sass.

Web Development

I have started to study at SCC as this major since 2020. Eventhough my major was completely different, I really love coding.

Knitting Design

My first major was a Knitting design. I have 9 years of experience in this field and had worked as knitting designer- technician in Mongolia's biggest cashmere product manufacturer company called "Gobi Cashmere" for 5 years.
